page.title: 07Traffic Count
page.content: On Wednesday the 3rd July we went outside the school to do a traffic count from{11.20 _ 12.05 approx.}53 cars passed the school.We also tallied what{registrations}they had,most were '85's B registration.There was only one car with a personal number plate which read NEB 6 which belongs to Mr Norman Edward Bryant Esq. of Copsale. From N to S travelled 28 cars and from S to N travelled 25 cars.Only 1{bus passed which was a Phoenix without a number.In one day 5 Southdown buses pass the school,3 going from N to S and 2 go from S to N.Most of the{cars were business type cars and only about 7 mini and small economy cars.Most of the cars were blue which equalled 5,white 3,brown 2,red 1,green 2, beige 2,cream 1.Car types: Talbot 2, Ford 6,Renault 2,Vauxhall 1,Rover 1, Morris 1,Austin 1,Volkswagon 1.
